Job Position: Senior Accounting Consultant

	With over a decade of experience, they are seeking a Chartered and experienced Accountant to join their Accounting Services Unit, where the successful candidate will play a key role in delivering exceptional services and sustaining the firm&rsquo;s reputation for excellence.
	The ideal candidate will have a strong background in accounting, finance, and taxation.
	This role requires excellent analytical skills, attention to detail, and the ability to provide financial advice and support to clients and stakeholders.

	Prepare and review financial statements, reports, and tax returns for individuals, businesses, and organizations.
	Responsible for Clients Financial reporting processes, including preparation of periodic management accounts, Bank and other reconciliation exercises, accounts receivable, accounts payable, payroll processes, cost and management accounts, etc., for accuracy and efficiency and to support their strategic decision-making.
	Perform audits, reviews, and evaluations of financial records and transactions to ensure accuracy, legality, and compliance with regulations.
	Analyze financial data, trends, and performance metrics to identify opportunities for improvement and risk mitigation.
	Stay updated on accounting principles, regulations, and industry standards to ensure compliance and best practices.
	Maintain accurate and organized financial records, documents, and databases.


Requirements and Qualifications


	Bachelor&#39;s Degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field.
	Minimum of 3 years of proven experience in accounting or financial advisory services.
	Must be a Chartered Accountant.
	Strong understanding of accounting principles, financial reporting standards, and tax laws.
	Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
	Proficiency in SAGE and QUICKBOOKS
	Integrity and professionalism in handling confidential financial information and client relationships.
	Adaptability and willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and regulations.
	Attention to detail and accuracy in work.


Method of Application&nbsp;

        Updeal Resources - Our client is registered with the main objective of utilizing a multi-disciplinary approach to its accountancy; auditing; financial & fair value due diligence; enterprise rehabilitation and restructuring; taxation; and economic consulting services in order to provide its clients with an integrated means of meeting their needs and achieving their objectives.

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Accounting Consultant
Job Location: Lagos

Job Description

	With over a decade of experience, they are seeking a Chartered and experienced Accountant to join their Accounting Services Unit, where the successful candidate will play a key role in delivering exceptional services and sustaining the firm’s reputation for excellence.
	The ideal candidate will have a strong background in accounting, finance, and taxation.
	This role requires excellent analytical skills, attention to detail, and the ability to provide financial advice and support to clients and stakeholders.


Responsibilities


	Prepare and review financial statements, reports, and tax returns for individuals, businesses, and organizations.
	Responsible for Clients Financial reporting processes, including preparation of periodic management accounts, Bank and other reconciliation exercises, accounts receivable, accounts payable, payroll processes, cost and management accounts, etc., for accuracy and efficiency and to support their strategic decision-making.
	Perform audits, reviews, and evaluations of financial records and transactions to ensure accuracy, legality, and compliance with regulations.
	Analyze financial data, trends, and performance metrics to identify opportunities for improvement and risk mitigation.
	Stay updated on accounting principles, regulations, and industry standards to ensure compliance and best practices.
	Maintain accurate and organized financial records, documents, and databases.


Requirements and Qualifications


	Bachelor's Degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field.
	Minimum of 3 years of proven experience in accounting or financial advisory services.
	Must be a Chartered Accountant.
	Strong understanding of accounting principles, financial reporting standards, and tax laws.
	Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
	Proficiency in SAGE and QUICKBOOKS
	Integrity and professionalism in handling confidential financial information and client relationships.

  "description": "Harmony Garden and Estate Development Limited is a pioneering real estate and construction firm committed to innovation, sustainability, and excellence. We are working to utilizes innovative technologies to enhance the sustainability, sales and efficiency of building projects.

As a leading real estate company specializing in the sale of land with genuine titles, luxury property development, and farm city settlements, Harmony Gardens is synonymous with integrity, quality, and exceptional service. With 1,300 hectares of genuine land valued at $215 million USD and investments across multiple sister businesses&mdash;including Royal Crystal Airways, BMTC Energy, and Ibile Industrial Park&mdash;we are well-positioned for significant growth.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Mechanical Engineer

Job Location:&nbsp;Ibeju-Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Mechanical Engineer will be responsible The Mechanical Engineer is responsible for designing, supervising, and ensuring the installation, operation, and maintenance of all mechanical systems in building construction projects.
	The role involves coordinating with architects, civil engineers, and electrical engineers to ensure the proper integration of HVAC, plumbing, fire protection, and other mechanical systems in line with project specifications, safety standards, and client requirements.


Key Responsibilities


	Prepare mechanical design drawings, plans, and specifications for HVAC, plumbing, drainage, fire-fighting, and gas systems.
	Review and interpret construction blueprints, technical drawings, and specifications.
	Conduct site surveys and feasibility studies to determine mechanical system requirements.
	Ensure all mechanical designs comply with local building codes, safety regulations, and sustainability standards.
	Supervise the installation, testing, and commissioning of mechanical systems at construction sites.
	Monitor project progress to ensure timely and quality delivery of mechanical works.
	Inspect and verify that installations are executed as per approved drawings and standards.
	Conduct mechanical inspections and testing (pressure tests, air balancing, etc.).
	Ensure adherence to quality assurance and safety standards.
	Work closely with architects, structural engineers, and electrical engineers to ensure seamless system integration.
	Participate in project meetings and provide technical input on mechanical aspects.
	Develop operation and maintenance manuals for mechanical systems.
	Support post-construction maintenance and troubleshooting activities.


Job Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree of HND in Mechanical Engineering or related field.
	3&ndash;5 years of experience in building construction or MEP (Mechanical, Electrical &amp; Plumbing) services.
	Professional certification or COREN registration is an added advantage.
	Strong knowledge of AutoCAD, Revit MEP, and other design software.
	Excellent understanding of HVAC, plumbing, fire protection, and mechanical systems.
	Strong analytical, problem-solving, and project management skills.
	Good communication and team coordination abilities.


What We Offer


	Competitive Salary
	Professional Growth &amp; Development Opportunities
	Supportive &amp; Collaborative Work Environment
	Exposure to a Fast-Growing Real Estate Industry.


Method of Application

        Harmony Garden and Estate Development Limited is a pioneering real estate and construction firm committed to innovation, sustainability, and excellence. We are working to utilizes innovative technologies to enhance the sustainability, sales and efficiency of building projects.

As a leading real estate company specializing in the sale of land with genuine titles, luxury property development, and farm city settlements, Harmony Gardens is synonymous with integrity, quality, and exceptional service. With 1,300 hectares of genuine land valued at $215 million USD and investments across multiple sister businesses—including Royal Crystal Airways, BMTC Energy, and Ibile Industrial Park—we are well-positioned for significant growth.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Mechanical Engineer

Job Location: Ibeju-Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Mechanical Engineer will be responsible The Mechanical Engineer is responsible for designing, supervising, and ensuring the installation, operation, and maintenance of all mechanical systems in building construction projects.
	The role involves coordinating with architects, civil engineers, and electrical engineers to ensure the proper integration of HVAC, plumbing, fire protection, and other mechanical systems in line with project specifications, safety standards, and client requirements.


Key Responsibilities


	Prepare mechanical design drawings, plans, and specifications for HVAC, plumbing, drainage, fire-fighting, and gas systems.
	Review and interpret construction blueprints, technical drawings, and specifications.
	Conduct site surveys and feasibility studies to determine mechanical system requirements.
	Ensure all mechanical designs comply with local building codes, safety regulations, and sustainability standards.
	Supervise the installation, testing, and commissioning of mechanical systems at construction sites.
	Monitor project progress to ensure timely and quality delivery of mechanical works.
	Inspect and verify that installations are executed as per approved drawings and standards.
	Conduct mechanical inspections and testing (pressure tests, air balancing, etc.).
	Ensure adherence to quality assurance and safety standards.
	Work closely with architects, structural engineers, and electrical engineers to ensure seamless system integration.
	Participate in project meetings and provide technical input on mechanical aspects.
	Develop operation and maintenance manuals for mechanical systems.
	Support post-construction maintenance and troubleshooting activities.


Job Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree of HND in Mechanical Engineering or related field.
	3–5 years of experience in building construction or MEP (Mechanical, Electrical & Plumbing) services.
	Professional certification or COREN registration is an added advantage.
	Strong knowledge of AutoCAD, Revit MEP, and other design software.
	Excellent understanding of HVAC, plumbing, fire protection, and mechanical systems.
	Strong analytical, problem-solving, and project management skills.
	Good communication and team coordination abilities.


What We Offer


	Competitive Salary
	Professional Growth & Development Opportunities
	Supportive & Collaborative Work Environment
	Exposure to a Fast-Growing Real Estate Industry.


Method of Application

Job Position: Inventory Officer

Job Locations: Abuja (FCT) and Port Harcourt - Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	We are seeking for a detail-oriented and proactive Inventory Officer to join our Abuja and Port Harcourt team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for maintaining accurate stock records, coordinating product movement between branches, and ensuring seamless inventory management for our range of luxury furniture, home fragrances, lighting, and décor items.You will work closely with the sales and showroom teams to ensure product availability, proper display, and timely replenishment that reflects our brand’s commitment to excellence.


Responsibilities


	Guarantee accuracy and completeness of inventory records, keep an eye on and regulate inventory levels, track stock movements, and conduct routine stock counts.
	Acquire, examine, and document incoming inventory shipments, confirming the quantity, calibre, and state of the items in accordance with purchase orders or packing slips.
	Keep correct and up-to-date inventory records, update inventory databases, systems, or spreadsheets to reflect stock transactions, modifications, and movements.
	Estimate inventory needs, establish reorder points, and ascertain the ideal stock levels, examine demand trends, sales projections, and previous data.


Qualifications


	HND or B.Sc in any related field.
	Experience: 2 - 3 years of experience
	Have a strong communication and inter personal skill
	Proficiency in excel and MS suit, attention to details
	Strong analytical skills, problem solving skills, ability to work in a team.


Salary
N130,000 - N150,000 per month (Negotiable).

Method of Application
